City Secretary
==============

The City Secretary's mission is to safeguard official records, share information with the public and administer elections.

Vanessa Trevino
---------------

City Secretary

Vanessa Trevino has served in a variety of positions with the City of La Joya, including roles in the Municipal Court, Utilities, Administration, and as a Volunteer Firefighter for La Joya Fire EMS Department. She has a background in administration, psychology, and holds a certification in business practices.

​

She currently serves as the Public Information Coordinator (PIC) for compliance with the Texas Public Information Act (TPIA) and as the Public Information Officer (PIO) for Emergency Management.

![Vanessa Trevino](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/b5dafa_aa9911348d7c47909d009b76f7b1dd3f~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_374,h_489,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/b5dafa_aa9911348d7c47909d009b76f7b1dd3f~mv2.jpg)

Department Description
----------------------

As Permitted by the Home-Rule Charter:

The City Council shall appoint a City Secretary who shall report administratively to the City Manager ...

The duties of the City Secretary shall be to:

1. prepare and post the notice of Council meetings;
2. keep the minutes of proceedings of Council meetings;
3. authenticate by signature and record in full, in a book kept and indexed for that purpose, all ordinances and resolutions passed by the City Council;
4. hold and maintain the City Seal and affix the Seal to all instruments requiring it; and
5. perform such other duties as may be specified by the City Council, City Manager, this Charter, or the laws of the State of Texas.

[News](https://www.lajoyatx.gov/news)

City Secretary Services
-----------------------

### Meeting Agendas & Minutes

[![Post It ](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/208ddc9c8c493cf5cba4eb0bc8d56914.jpg/v1/crop/x_129,y_0,w_741,h_677/fill/w_372,h_339,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Post%20It%20.jpg)](https://www.lajoyatx.gov/agendas-and-minutes)

The City Secretary is charged with publishing notices of all public [Meetings Agendas & Minutes](https://www.lajoyatx.gov/agendas-and-minutes) and compliance with the [Texas Open Meetings Act](https://statutes.capitol.texas.gov/Docs/GV/htm/GV.551.htm). 

* [Meeting Agenda Archives](https://www.cityoflajoya.com/city-events/)

​

Council Regular and Special Meetings are live streamed via our [Zoom](https://zoom.us/) account.  Specific information and links are found in the posted Council meeting agendas.

​

Persons interested in addressing the Council are required to submit a Public Forum Form to the City Secretary before any Council meeting.

### Ordinances & Resolutions

[![Law books on shelf](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/11062b_1f6f85a43b134694afd4824f80ccedb7~mv2.jpg/v1/crop/x_675,y_0,w_3650,h_3333/fill/w_372,h_339,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Law%20Books.jpg)](https://www.amlegal.com/)

As records custodian, the City Secretary maintains the Home-Rule Charter, Ordinances and Resolutions approved by the Council, as well as Mayoral Proclamations.

​

The [La Joya Home Rule Charter](https://www.lajoyatx.gov/_files/ugd/3c0551_4e63c369993f4721b6b508f6cd1f692d.pdf) and Ordinances will be codified by [American Legal Publishing](https://www.amlegal.com/) and made available online later this year.

### Public Information

[![Open Book](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/01082d1b91d34c3dbb08f97b94157f07.jpg/v1/crop/x_259,y_0,w_1402,h_1280/fill/w_372,h_339,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Open%20Book.jpg)](https://www.texasattorneygeneral.gov/open-government/members-public/overview-public-information-act#:~:text=The%20Public%20Information%20Act%20(PIA,the%20public%20in%20specific%20instances.)

The City Secretary is the official records custodian for the City.  The City Secretary also serves as the Public Information Coordinator (PIC) in compliance with the [Texas Pubic Information Act (TPIA)](https://www.texasattorneygeneral.gov/open-government/members-public/overview-public-information-act#:~:text=The%20Public%20Information%20Act%20(PIA,the%20public%20in%20specific%20instances.).

​

To obtain a publicly-available official record, you may contact the City Secretary or complete and return an Open Records Request Form.

### Public Disclosures

[![Magnifying Glass](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/9e94c3243314391af0e112ab0e3dc4a2.jpg/v1/crop/x_0,y_35,w_800,h_731/fill/w_372,h_339,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Magnifying%20Glass.jpg)](https://www.texasattorneygeneral.gov/open-government/members-public/overview-public-information-act#:~:text=The%20Public%20Information%20Act%20(PIA,the%20public%20in%20specific%20instances.)

State and local laws require certain disclosures relating to purchasing. Check [Finance Department](https://www.lajoyatx.gov/finance-department) for required forms.

​

* Local Government Officers List (Ch 176)
* Current Conflict of Interest Disclosure Statement(s) (Ch. 176):  [Laura Macias](https://www.lajoyatx.gov/_files/ugd/2f2ad4_f68c05642ba74119b76bba6b23727ab1.pdf); [Elias Macias](https://www.lajoyatx.gov/_files/ugd/2f2ad4_3aec36147acb4923811805ade8241fea.pdf).

​

### Elections

[![Election Campaign](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/a3aaaf7d43e04daf9bc9126cb9f1bb69.jpg/v1/crop/x_758,y_0,w_4100,h_3744/fill/w_372,h_339,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Election%20Campaign.jpg)](https://www.votetexas.gov/register-to-vote/update-voter-registration.html)

The City Secretary charged with administering local elections.  However, the City has an agreement with the [Hidalgo County Elections Department](https://www.hidalgocounty.us/105/Elections-Department) to administer elections as per state law.

​

Registered voters may vote in La Joya at:

​

La Joya Youth Center

604 Salomon Chapa St

La Joya TX 78560

​

[Register to vote](https://www.votetexas.gov/register-to-vote/update-voter-registration.html) before any election.

### Vital Records

![Archive documents on shelf](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/11062b_3c83c170368c49508bd78126dd6f8bab~mv2.jpg/v1/crop/x_674,y_0,w_3644,h_3328/fill/w_372,h_339,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Archive.jpg)

The City may have birth, marriage and death certificates for residents within the La Joya City Limits.

​

Individuals outside the City may contact the [Hidalgo County Clerk's Office](https://www.hidalgocounty.us/161/County-Clerks-Office) for more information.

### Board Appointments

![High Fives](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/79f27ff85a37460ca6d3f0db3c070dea.jpg/v1/crop/x_649,y_0,w_3488,h_3185/fill/w_372,h_339,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/High%20Fives.jpg)

The City Secretary coordinates Council appointments to citizen advisory and other boards and committees.

​

Individuals interested in serving the City must complete a [Board Action Form](https://www.lajoyatx.gov/_files/ugd/3c0551_0d32821adfa44bc1bbfe9b8d76fcfda0.docx?dn=CSO-BAF2310.docx) and submit it to the City Secretary 72 hours before a Council meeting.
